case studies

Council Facilities

Creating lasting first impressions.

Featured Case Study

Our extensive experience and knowledge of the commercial sector means our tailored services involve more than just cleaning.

Our highly trained and knowledgeable staff understand the value of security protocols and processes, professionalism in conduct and appearance, and courtesy to all they meet. Industries and facilities,

Storm International have specialised in commercial cleaning for over 30 years. Our national commercial cleaning services include total solutions that ensure clean, safe and healthy working environments for single site and multi-site businesses.
